Name: Leupold Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm DeltaPoint hybrid assault scope
Description: Hybrid Leupold-produced scope comprises the Mark 4 HAMR 4x24mm optical sight withDeltaPoint reflex sight installed on top of it. It was developed for precision mid-range carbine fire using the 4x optics while being equally effective in close quarters thanks to use of compact reflex sight when necessary.
